import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {CalendarIcon, PlusIcon} from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; import axios from "axios"; const News = () => { const [user,setUser]=useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:8000/users/me',{ headers: { 'accept': 'application/json' }, withCredentials: true }).then((res)=>setUser(res.data)) }, []); return (
{user.username}

); }; export default News;
